ValidationRule.description: Required fields when Split of Assets Complete is populated: Fund Allocation, EE Search ID, Alt Payee Search ID and SunGard Number
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name = 'QDRO' && (NOT(ISNULL( Split_of_Assets_Complete__c )) && (ISBLANK(TEXT( Fund_Allocation__c)) || ISBLANK(EE_Search_ID__c) || ISBLANK( Alt_Payee_Search_ID__c) || ISBLANK(SunGard_Number__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: * Required fields when Split of Assets Complete is populated: SunGard Number, Fund Allocation, EE Search ID, Alt Payee Search ID *
